title: Man peddling vitamins as cancer therapy faces 5 felony counts
description: With allegedly fake title, Gevorkian sold unproven treatments for serious conditions.

description: The limitations are harsh, but it works.

title: Amazon will brick all Halo health trackers on August 1
description: The Halo Rise sleep tracker only came out 5 months ago.

description: A confident, deeper sequel that embraces Star Wars’ spirit of adventure.

title: Elizabeth Holmes gets bail extension one day before prison term start
description: Holmes' last-ditch appeal triggered an automatic freeze on her previous bail denial.

title: TikTok ban stalls as Montana governor suggests covering all foreign foes
description: Critics say Montana's TikTok ban still isn't technically or legally feasible.

title: Webb telescope probes the chemistry in a hot gas giant’s atmosphere
description: Near a star, there's chemistry that doesn't occur in our Solar System's gas giants.

title: An octopus’s stripes can act as a unique ID
description: Finding may help us track animals in the wild, perform genetic studies.

title: The Lenovo ThinkPhone hits shelves April 28 for $699
description: Four months after it was announced, the ThinkPhone is finally shipping.

title: Colorado governor signs tractor right-to-repair law opposed by John Deere
description: Manufacturers must provide repair parts, embedded software, and documentation.

description: "These scars we have make us who we are. We're not meant to go back and fix them."

title: After nearly two years, Virgin Galactic’s space plane returns to the sky
description: The spacecraft takes a step toward commercial spaceflight.

title: On-by-default Edge feature seems to be sending all the URLs you visit to Bing

description: How do frogs and other amphibians survive their own noxious weapons?

description: New CPUs and GPUs and low RAM and SSD prices change many of our recommendations.

title: Remember the EV Honda is building with GM? It goes on sale in 2024
description: Two Ultium-based EVs arrive next year, an in-house EV follows in 2025.
